Text: EPower implementation planI attach a followup to the EPower regulatory review a month implementation program which focuses on gaining transmission access and streamlining the permitting process The program provides for periodic reality checks the first of which will occur at the end of the third quart er EPower Implementation Plandoc

RE USTR Cc I last spoke with John Neuffer about his meetings with the Japanese side on June just prior to completion of the Fourth Joint Status report released on June I attach a copy of the joint status report for your reference I also attach recent copies of the weekly political updates we have been preparing for internal consumption The most recent report contains an overview of the new structure of the bilateral deregulation talks JSRFinalrtf It would be good if we could talk prior to the meeting so that I can give y ou feedback on my discussions with John and an update of what is currently happening in Japan When would you be available to talk kind regards Original Message From Briggs Tom Sent Wednesday July AM To ODay Nicholas Cc Robertson Linda Shapiro Richard Subject USTR I have scheduled a meeting with John Nueffer of USTR on Monday to get feedback on the USG discussions with Japan on the energy and telecommunications regulation initiatives Steve Burns will join me Ill report back once I meet with John
